entry.title: 2025未来展望
entry.content:
preview

区别于写年终总结,作为才学三个月的大一新人,未来展望的部分显然会更多,待我应付完高数便是更新之时

Different from writing the year-end summary, as a freshman who has only studied for three months, the future outlook part will obviously be more. It’s time for me to update my blog after I finish my A-level exam

entry.title: hexo fluid主题blog的建立与美化~
entry.content:
用hugo还是hexo做博客纠结了挺久的 最终选了hexo是因为我是小白 而hexo的教程更多更成熟

hexo的主题是在butterfly和fluid中选择了后者 虽然看很多博客用butterfly做的很漂亮 但fluid的简洁戳中了我这个学二进制的新手 开袋即食呀 现阶段也没必要花大精力折腾前端网页啥的o((>ω< ))o

同样这篇blog也偷个懒哈哈 直接上链接 没搭过的朋友在全流程在第一个链接看到使用hexo d就可以去看下面的链接了 因为链接全是中文的哈哈 就不双语了

全流程https://blog.csdn.net/sinat_37781304/article/details/82729029

fluid指南https://hexo.fluid-dev.com/docs/guide/

[https://youlan-lan.github.io/2021/06/07/Hexo%20%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98%E4%B9%8B%20Fluid/#Hexo-%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98%E4%B9%8B-Fluid](https://youlan-lan.github.io/2021/06/07/Hexo 主题之 Fluid/#Hexo-主题之-Fluid)

如何写文章https://fuguigui.github.io/hexo2/

分享搭建hexo博客报错历程https://ppppz.net/2021/12/27/%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BAhexo%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2%E6%8A%A5%E9%94%99%E5%8E%86%E7%A8%8B/

插入图片https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/265077468

原理https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000008784436

blog美化之神https://www.fomal.cc/

fluid美化https://mrna16.github.io/2024/11/14/%E3%80%90Hexo%E3%80%91Fluid%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98%E7%BE%8E%E5%8C%96/

https://b.wihi.top/posts/c1486c12

日夜切换https://4rozen.github.io/archives/Hexo/60191.html

entry.title: My First Blog
entry.content:
本来在想大一就写博客是不是过于早了些 毕竟现在水平有限 都不敢贴出来让大佬们笑话

不过来日方长 等有内容的时候 我定然会厚着脸皮到处蹭友链的ヾ(≧▽≦*)o.

另外 现在到了瓶颈期 0基础直接学二进制难免会遇到基础不牢的问题 相信写博客可以让我静下心来思考 避免浮躁 有助于清晰思路 踏实学习。

我电脑设置的仅英文标点看起来是有点难受 我干脆用空格算了 BTW 我想试试做双语博客.

I was wondering if it was too early to write a blog as a freshman, after all, my current level is too low, which I dare not post it to make you masters laugh.

However,as an old Chinese saying goes:,”Sailing with the wind, breaking the waves, my ship will someday reach the deep blue sea. “

There is no denying that I’ll brazenly po my friends’ links everywhereヾ(≧▽≦*)o

Besides,I believe writing can help me overcome my bottleneck and lay a solid foundation in binary learning. It would also allow me to reflect and stay grounded rather than become restless.
